specials.name: Mountain Stance
specials.description: While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 status bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don’t add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet.

specials.name: Hungry Monk
specials.description: Requirement The zombie has a creature grabbed or restrained. Effect The zombie makes a jaws unarmed melee Strike against the grabbed or restrained creature with an attack modifier of +15 that deals 1d8+5 piercing damage.  The zombie lord monk gains 1 temporary hp per hd of the creature.

specials.name: Flurry of Blows
specials.description: Make two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally. As it has the flourish trait, you can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

specials.name: Crushing Grab
specials.description: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp. When you successfully Grapple a creature, you can deal bludgeoning damage to that creature equal to your Strength modifier. You can make this attack nonlethal with no penalty.

specials.name: Titan Wrestler
specials.description: You can attempt to Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you, or up to three sizes larger than you if you’re legendary in Athletics.

immunity.value: death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
